result.eng: The stories are about soldiers who are killed and women who are left behind.
result.ga: Baineann na scéalta le saighdiúirí a mharaítear agus na mná a fhágtar ina ndiaidh
result.orig: Baineann na scéalta le saighdiúirí a mharaítear agus na mná a fhágtar ina ndiaidh
result.html: Baineann na scéalta le saighdiúirí a mharaítear agus na mná a fhágtar ina ndiaidhThe stories are about soldiers who are killed and women who are left behind.
result.ponchtml: Baineann na scéalta le saiġdiúirí a ṁaraítear agus na mná a ḟágtar ina ndiaiḋThe stories are about soldiers who are killed and women who are left behind.

result.eng: We built fences for fear of attack from the soldiers.
result.ga: Thógamar claíthe ar eagla ionsaí ó na saighdiúirí
result.orig: Thógamar claíthe ar eagla ionsaí ó na saighdiúirí
result.html: Thógamar claíthe ar eagla ionsaí ó na saighdiúiríWe built fences for fear of attack from the soldiers.
result.ponchtml: Ṫógamar claíṫe ar eagla ionsaí ó na saiġdiúiríWe built fences for fear of attack from the soldiers.

result.eng: The attacks were apparently being planned by Osama Bin Laden's soldiers for several years.
result.ga: Is cosúil go raibh na hionsaithe seo á mbeartú ag saighdiúirí Osama Bin Laden le cúpla bliain
result.orig: Is cosúil go raibh na hionsaithe seo á mbeartú ag saighdiúirí Osama Bin Laden le cúpla bliain
result.html: Is cosúil go raibh na hionsaithe seo á mbeartú ag saighdiúirí Osama Bin Laden le cúpla bliainThe attacks were apparently being planned by Osama Bin Laden's soldiers for several years.
result.ponchtml: Is cosúil go raiḃ na hionsaiṫe seo á mbeartú ag saiġdiúirí Osama Bin Laden le cúpla bliainThe attacks were apparently being planned by Osama Bin Laden's soldiers for several years.

result.eng: Osama Bin Laden and most of his soldiers are dead now.
result.ga: Tá Osama Bin Laden agus tromlach a shaighdiúirí marbh anois
result.orig: Tá Osama Bin Laden agus tromlach a shaighdiúirí marbh anois
result.html: Tá Osama Bin Laden agus tromlach a shaighdiúirí marbh anoisOsama Bin Laden and most of his soldiers are dead now.
result.ponchtml: Tá Osama Bin Laden agus tromlaċ a ẛaiġdiúirí marḃ anoisOsama Bin Laden and most of his soldiers are dead now.

result.eng: This was done in Shannon Airport where you see thousands of American soldiers every day on their way to Iraq.
result.ga: Rinneadh seo in Aerfort na Sionainne áit a bhfeictear na mílte saighdiúirí Meiriceánacha gach lá anois ar a mbealach chun na hIaráice
result.orig: Rinneadh seo in Aerfort na Sionainne áit a bhfeictear na mílte saighdiúirí Meiriceánacha gach lá anois ar a mbealach chun na hIaráice
result.html: Rinneadh seo in Aerfort na Sionainne áit a bhfeictear na mílte saighdiúirí Meiriceánacha gach lá anois ar a mbealach chun na hIaráiceThis was done in Shannon Airport where you see thousands of American soldiers every day on their way to Iraq.
result.ponchtml: Rinneaḋ seo in Aerfort na Sionainne áit a ḃfeictear na mílte saiġdiúirí Meiriceánaċa gaċ lá anois ar a mbealaċ ċun na hIaráiceThis was done in Shannon Airport where you see thousands of American soldiers every day on their way to Iraq.
